oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Western Pennsylvania Humane Society ambulance
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Jim Key was a talented horse who was able to perform numerous tricks that showcased his intelligence and unique personality. His trainer, Dr. William Key, was an ex-slave who championed patience and kindness as the keys to successful horse training.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Beautiful Jim Key (Horse); Humane societies
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This photograph shows a relatively new innovation for the time, an animal ambulance. The ambulance is for the Western Pennsylvania Humane Society, and has a picture of Jim Key on the back. There were countless horses working in the United States
